newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia 6-mth T-bill yield rises to 78.18 pct.
newsitem.headline: Russia 6-mth T-bill yield rises to 78.18 pct.

text.p: An issue of seven trillion roubles of six-month GKO discount Treasury bills yielded an average 78.18 percent at auction on Wednesday, the Russian central bank said.
At the previous auction of six-month T-bills on August 28, the average yield was 74.34 percent.
Full details of the auction follow:
Issue volume 7.00 trln rbls 7.00 trln rbls
Non-residents were allowed to buy up to 35 percent of the issue.

Earlier the finance ministry raised 2.50 trillion roubles when it sold 3.05 trillion roubles worth of three-month T-bills (series number 21070), taking total proceeds from today's auction to 6.77 trillion roubles.
The finance ministry also repaid about 6.75 trillion roubles in maturing six-month T-bills (series number 22023).
